author: seedstars
title: Catalyst in Emerging Markets
description: 85% of the global population live in emerging and frontier markets and they lack information about Blockchain, Cardano, and Catalyst.
solution: Create a partnership: Seedstars and the Cardano Catalyst School promoting their content to more than 200,000 entrepreneurs from our network.
experience: We support entrepreneurs in 90+ countries growing and scaling their companies to create meaningful and lasting change. seedstars.com
